attributes.additional_details:
If the petitions website isn't even going to be used properly, why should we even have it? its a waste of space is it not? why should we waste our time saying something if all were going to get is a long response of the government saying "no."

Our time is saved by not having someone to be turned away, and your time is saved by not having to send us the same copy and pasted responses, its a win win.
attributes.background: I want the government to shutdown the petitions website, time after time we have been shown to get incredibly high amounts of support for certain petitions. All of which have been responded with what is basically a no.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Shut down the UK Government and Parliament Petitions system 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734870
